summary:
After last year’s flurry of over-the-top crypto activity in China, the scene has quieted down, leaving only the true believers
A lot of truly interesting projects are coming out of China these days
The hardware (miners), infrastructure (mining installations), and financial institutions (the crypto exchanges) are all here, and that ends up creating a fertile ground for new projects
author: Eric Meltzer
The Block
title: Proof of Work: Made in China
content: The following newsletter is republished with permission from Eric Meltzer of Primitive Ventures, a global venture investment firm with a focus on blockchain and related technologies. You can follow Eric on Twitter at @wheatpond and subscribe here to Proof of Work.
